widgets.text:
# Network security
* Secure cluster connectivity (on Azure, NoPublicIP)
* Customer-managed VPC (or VNet injection)
* VPC (or VNet) peering  
* IP access lists

# Identity & Access
* Single sign-on (AWS only, Azure and GCP always enabled)
* SCIM for user provisioning
* Role-based access control
* Token management

# Governance
* Cluster policy
* Audit logs (diagnostic logs on Azure)
* Init script
* DBFS mounts

# Data protection
* Secrets management
* Encryption
* Data exfiltration protections

query.name: category_pillars
query.query: SELECT BP.check_id, check as Check, BP.severity as Severity, score as Status, chk_date as RunDate, concat( '', BP.recommendation, '' ) as Recommendation, CASE WHEN BP.severity = 'High' THEN 3 WHEN BP.severity = 'Medium' THEN 2 ELSE 1 END as ord, workspaceid FROM ( SELECT id, score, chk_date, workspaceid FROM security_analysis.security_checks where run_id = coalesce ( ( select max(run_id) from security_analysis.workspace_run_complete where workspace_id = {{workspaceid}} and completed = true and chk_date = '{{date_param}}' ), ( select max(run_id) from security_analysis.workspace_run_complete where workspace_id = {{workspaceid}} and completed = true ) ) ) SC, security_analysis.security_best_practices BP WHERE SC.id = BP.id and BP.category = {{category}} and workspaceid = {{workspaceid}} ORDER BY Status DESC, ord DESC

query.name: account_stats
query.query:
SELECT
  name,
  value.value
FROM
  security_analysis.account_info
where
  category = 'Account Stats'
  and run_id = coalesce (
    (
      select
        max(run_id)
      from
        security_analysis.workspace_run_complete
      where
        workspace_id = {{workspaceid}}
        and completed = true
        and chk_date = '{{date_param}}'
    ),
    (
      select
        max(run_id)
      from
        security_analysis.workspace_run_complete
      where
        workspace_id = {{workspaceid}}
        and completed = true
    )
  )
  and workspaceid = {{workspaceid}}
ORDER BY
  name

query.query: SELECT BP.check_id, check as Check, BP.severity as Severity, score as Status, chk_date as RunDate, concat( '', BP.recommendation, '' ) as Recommendation, CASE WHEN BP.severity = 'High' THEN 3 WHEN BP.severity = 'Medium' THEN 2 ELSE 1 END as ord, workspaceid FROM ( SELECT id, score, chk_date, workspaceid FROM security_analysis.security_checks where run_id = coalesce ( ( select max(run_id) from security_analysis.workspace_run_complete where workspace_id = {{workspaceid}} and completed = true and chk_date = '{{date_param}}' ), ( select max(run_id) from security_analysis.workspace_run_complete where workspace_id = {{workspaceid}} and completed = true ) ) ) SC, security_analysis.security_best_practices BP WHERE SC.id = BP.id and BP.category = {{category}} and workspaceid = {{workspaceid}} ORDER BY Status DESC, ord DESC

query.name: summary_stats

parameters.name: date_param
parameters.title: Analysis date (Shows results for the most recent analysis when no analysis is found for this date)

query.query:
Select
  concat(
    results.category,
    ' (Out of ',
    category_count,
    ')'
  ) as category,
  severity,
  severity_count,
  ord
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      sbp.category,
      sbp.severity,
      count(sbp.severity) severity_count,
      CASE
        WHEN sbp.severity = 'High' THEN 3
        WHEN sbp.severity = 'Medium' THEN 2
        ELSE 1
      END as ord
    FROM
      security_analysis.security_checks sc,
      security_analysis.security_best_practices sbp
    where
      score = 1
      and sc.id = sbp.id
      and run_id = coalesce (
        (
          select
            max(run_id)
          from
            security_analysis.workspace_run_complete
          where
            workspace_id = {{workspaceid}}
            and completed = true
            and chk_date = '{{date_param}}'
        ),
        (
          select
            max(run_id)
          from
            security_analysis.workspace_run_complete
          where
            workspace_id = {{workspaceid}}
            and completed = true
        )
      )
      and category not IN ('Workspace Settings', 'Workspace Stats')
      and workspaceid = {{workspaceid}}
    group by
      sbp.category,
      sbp.severity
  ) as results,
  (
    SELECT
      category,
      count(*) as category_count
    FROM
      security_analysis.security_best_practices
    WHERE
      category not IN ('Workspace Settings', 'Workspace Stats')
    group by
      category
  ) as master
where
  results.category = master.category

query.name: security_check_details
query.query:
select
  sbp.check_id,
  sbp.check,
  sbp.recommendation,
  sc.additional_details,
  sbp.logic,
  if(
    sbp.evaluation_value == "-1",
    "N/A",
    sbp.evaluation_value
  ) as evaluation_value,
  regexp_replace(sbp.api, "<workspace_url>", aw.deployment_url) as api,
  sc.check_time
from
  security_analysis.security_checks sc,
  security_analysis.security_best_practices sbp,
  security_analysis.account_workspaces aw
where
  sc.id = sbp.id
  and sc.run_id = coalesce (
    (
      select
        max(run_id)
      from
        security_analysis.workspace_run_complete
      where
        workspace_id = {{workspaceid}}
        and completed = true
        and chk_date = '{{date_param}}'
    ),
    (
      select
        max(run_id)
      from
        security_analysis.workspace_run_complete
      where
        workspace_id = {{workspaceid}}
        and completed = true
    )
  )
  and sbp.check_id = {{ check_id }}
  and sc.workspaceid = {{workspaceid}}
  and aw.workspace_id = sc.workspaceid

query.name: category_counters
query.query:
SELECT
  count(*) as counter
FROM
  security_analysis.security_checks sc,
  security_analysis.security_best_practices sbp
where
  sc.id = sbp.id
  and sbp.severity = {{severity}}
  and sc.score = 1
  and sbp.category = {{category}}
  and sc.workspaceid = {{workspaceid}}
  and run_id = coalesce (
    (
      select
        max(run_id)
      from
        security_analysis.workspace_run_complete
      where
        workspace_id = {{workspaceid}}
        and completed = true
        and chk_date = '{{date_param}}'
    ),
    (
      select
        max(run_id)
      from
        security_analysis.workspace_run_complete
      where
        workspace_id = {{workspaceid}}
        and completed = true
    )
  )

widgets.text:
# Informational
* Admin counts
* ACLs
* User privileges
* Library and repo usage

query.name: category_pillars
query.query: SELECT BP.check_id, check as Check, BP.severity as Severity, score as Status, chk_date as RunDate, concat( '', BP.recommendation, '' ) as Recommendation, CASE WHEN BP.severity = 'High' THEN 3 WHEN BP.severity = 'Medium' THEN 2 ELSE 1 END as ord, workspaceid FROM ( SELECT id, score, chk_date, workspaceid FROM security_analysis.security_checks where run_id = coalesce ( ( select max(run_id) from security_analysis.workspace_run_complete where workspace_id = {{workspaceid}} and completed = true and chk_date = '{{date_param}}' ), ( select max(run_id) from security_analysis.workspace_run_complete where workspace_id = {{workspaceid}} and completed = true ) ) ) SC, security_analysis.security_best_practices BP WHERE SC.id = BP.id and BP.category = {{category}} and workspaceid = {{workspaceid}} ORDER BY Status DESC, ord DESC

query.name: analysis_date_time
query.query:
SELECT
  max(sc.check_time) date
FROM
  security_analysis.security_checks sc
where
  sc.workspaceid = {{workspaceid}}
  and run_id = coalesce (
    (
      select
        max(run_id)
      from
        security_analysis.workspace_run_complete
      where
        workspace_id = {{workspaceid}}
        and completed = true
        and chk_date = '{{date_param}}'
    ),
    (
      select
        max(run_id) 
      from
        security_analysis.workspace_run_complete
      where
        workspace_id = {{workspaceid}}
        and completed = true
    )
  )

query.name: workspace_config_changes
query.query: SELECT sc1.score as current_score, sc2.score as previous_score, BP.check_id, check as Check, BP.severity as Severity, sc1.score as Run1Status, sc2.score as Run2Status, sc1.check_time as Run1Date, sc2.check_time as Run2Date, concat( '', BP.recommendation, '' ) as Recommendation, CASE WHEN BP.severity = 'High' THEN 3 WHEN BP.severity = 'Medium' THEN 2 ELSE 1 END as ord, sc1.workspaceid FROM security_analysis.security_checks sc1, security_analysis.security_checks sc2, security_analysis.security_best_practices BP where sc1.workspaceid = {{workspaceid}} and sc2.workspaceid = sc1.workspaceid and sc1.id = sc2.id and sc1.id = BP.id and sc1.run_id = ( select max(run_id) from security_analysis.workspace_run_complete where workspace_id = {{workspaceid}} and completed = true and chk_date = '{{date_range.start}}' ) and sc2.run_id = ( select max(run_id) from security_analysis.workspace_run_complete where workspace_id = {{workspaceid}} and completed = true and run_id = ( select max(run_id) from security_analysis.workspace_run_complete where workspace_id = {{workspaceid}} and completed = true and chk_date = '{{date_range.end}}' ) )

queries.name: workspace_ids
queries.query:
SELECT
  workspace_id as value,
  concat(workspace_name, " (", workspace_id, ")") as name
FROM
  security_analysis.account_workspaces
WHERE
  analysis_enabled = true
order by workspace_id asc

queries.name: category_pillars
queries.query: SELECT BP.check_id, check as Check, BP.severity as Severity, score as Status, chk_date as RunDate, concat( '', BP.recommendation, '' ) as Recommendation, CASE WHEN BP.severity = 'High' THEN 3 WHEN BP.severity = 'Medium' THEN 2 ELSE 1 END as ord, workspaceid FROM ( SELECT id, score, chk_date, workspaceid FROM security_analysis.security_checks where run_id = coalesce ( ( select max(run_id) from security_analysis.workspace_run_complete where workspace_id = {{workspaceid}} and completed = true and chk_date = '{{date_param}}' ), ( select max(run_id) from security_analysis.workspace_run_complete where workspace_id = {{workspaceid}} and completed = true ) ) ) SC, security_analysis.security_best_practices BP WHERE SC.id = BP.id and BP.category = {{category}} and workspaceid = {{workspaceid}} ORDER BY Status DESC, ord DESC

queries.name: account_stats
queries.query:
SELECT
  name,
  value.value
FROM
  security_analysis.account_info
where
  category = 'Account Stats'
  and run_id = coalesce (
    (
      select
        max(run_id)
      from
        security_analysis.workspace_run_complete
      where
        workspace_id = {{workspaceid}}
        and completed = true
        and chk_date = '{{date_param}}'
    ),
    (
      select
        max(run_id)
      from
        security_analysis.workspace_run_complete
      where
        workspace_id = {{workspaceid}}
        and completed = true
    )
  )
  and workspaceid = {{workspaceid}}
ORDER BY
  name

queries.name: summary_stats

parameters.name: date_param
parameters.title: Analysis date (Shows results for the most recent analysis when no analysis is found for this date)

queries.query:
Select
  concat(
    results.category,
    ' (Out of ',
    category_count,
    ')'
  ) as category,
  severity,
  severity_count,
  ord
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      sbp.category,
      sbp.severity,
      count(sbp.severity) severity_count,
      CASE
        WHEN sbp.severity = 'High' THEN 3
        WHEN sbp.severity = 'Medium' THEN 2
        ELSE 1
      END as ord
    FROM
      security_analysis.security_checks sc,
      security_analysis.security_best_practices sbp
    where
      score = 1
      and sc.id = sbp.id
      and run_id = coalesce (
        (
          select
            max(run_id)
          from
            security_analysis.workspace_run_complete
          where
            workspace_id = {{workspaceid}}
            and completed = true
            and chk_date = '{{date_param}}'
        ),
        (
          select
            max(run_id)
          from
            security_analysis.workspace_run_complete
          where
            workspace_id = {{workspaceid}}
            and completed = true
        )
      )
      and category not IN ('Workspace Settings', 'Workspace Stats')
      and workspaceid = {{workspaceid}}
    group by
      sbp.category,
      sbp.severity
  ) as results,
  (
    SELECT
      category,
      count(*) as category_count
    FROM
      security_analysis.security_best_practices
    WHERE
      category not IN ('Workspace Settings', 'Workspace Stats')
    group by
      category
  ) as master
where
  results.category = master.category

queries.name: security_check_details
queries.query:
select
  sbp.check_id,
  sbp.check,
  sbp.recommendation,
  sc.additional_details,
  sbp.logic,
  if(
    sbp.evaluation_value == "-1",
    "N/A",
    sbp.evaluation_value
  ) as evaluation_value,
  regexp_replace(sbp.api, "<workspace_url>", aw.deployment_url) as api,
  sc.check_time
from
  security_analysis.security_checks sc,
  security_analysis.security_best_practices sbp,
  security_analysis.account_workspaces aw
where
  sc.id = sbp.id
  and sc.run_id = coalesce (
    (
      select
        max(run_id)
      from
        security_analysis.workspace_run_complete
      where
        workspace_id = {{workspaceid}}
        and completed = true
        and chk_date = '{{date_param}}'
    ),
    (
      select
        max(run_id)
      from
        security_analysis.workspace_run_complete
      where
        workspace_id = {{workspaceid}}
        and completed = true
    )
  )
  and sbp.check_id = {{ check_id }}
  and sc.workspaceid = {{workspaceid}}
  and aw.workspace_id = sc.workspaceid

queries.name: category_counters
queries.query:
SELECT
  count(*) as counter
FROM
  security_analysis.security_checks sc,
  security_analysis.security_best_practices sbp
where
  sc.id = sbp.id
  and sbp.severity = {{severity}}
  and sc.score = 1
  and sbp.category = {{category}}
  and sc.workspaceid = {{workspaceid}}
  and run_id = coalesce (
    (
      select
        max(run_id)
      from
        security_analysis.workspace_run_complete
      where
        workspace_id = {{workspaceid}}
        and completed = true
        and chk_date = '{{date_param}}'
    ),
    (
      select
        max(run_id)
      from
        security_analysis.workspace_run_complete
      where
        workspace_id = {{workspaceid}}
        and completed = true
    )
  )

queries.name: analysis_date_time
queries.query:
SELECT
  max(sc.check_time) date
FROM
  security_analysis.security_checks sc
where
  sc.workspaceid = {{workspaceid}}
  and run_id = coalesce (
    (
      select
        max(run_id)
      from
        security_analysis.workspace_run_complete
      where
        workspace_id = {{workspaceid}}
        and completed = true
        and chk_date = '{{date_param}}'
    ),
    (
      select
        max(run_id) 
      from
        security_analysis.workspace_run_complete
      where
        workspace_id = {{workspaceid}}
        and completed = true
    )
  )

queries.name: workspace_config_changes
queries.query: SELECT sc1.score as current_score, sc2.score as previous_score, BP.check_id, check as Check, BP.severity as Severity, sc1.score as Run1Status, sc2.score as Run2Status, sc1.check_time as Run1Date, sc2.check_time as Run2Date, concat( '', BP.recommendation, '' ) as Recommendation, CASE WHEN BP.severity = 'High' THEN 3 WHEN BP.severity = 'Medium' THEN 2 ELSE 1 END as ord, sc1.workspaceid FROM security_analysis.security_checks sc1, security_analysis.security_checks sc2, security_analysis.security_best_practices BP where sc1.workspaceid = {{workspaceid}} and sc2.workspaceid = sc1.workspaceid and sc1.id = sc2.id and sc1.id = BP.id and sc1.run_id = ( select max(run_id) from security_analysis.workspace_run_complete where workspace_id = {{workspaceid}} and completed = true and chk_date = '{{date_range.start}}' ) and sc2.run_id = ( select max(run_id) from security_analysis.workspace_run_complete where workspace_id = {{workspaceid}} and completed = true and run_id = ( select max(run_id) from security_analysis.workspace_run_complete where workspace_id = {{workspaceid}} and completed = true and chk_date = '{{date_range.end}}' ) )
